items.name: typealias Unicode.UTF32.EncodedScalar
items.desc: A valid scalar value as represented in this encoding

items.name: typealias Unicode.UTF32.ForwardParser
items.desc: A type that can be used to parse CodeUnits into EncodedScalars.

items.name: typealias Unicode.UTF32.ReverseParser
items.desc: A type that can be used to parse a reversed sequence of CodeUnits into EncodedScalars.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an instance of the UTF-32 codec.

items.name: static var encodedReplacementCharacter: Unicode.UTF32.EncodedScalar
items.desc: A unicode scalar value to be used when repairing encoding/decoding errors, as represented in this encoding.

items.name: func decode<I>(inout I) -> UnicodeDecodingResult
items.desc: Starts or continues decoding a UTF-32 sequence.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: static func decode(Unicode.UTF32.EncodedScalar) -> Unicode.Scalar
items.desc: Converts from encoded to encoding-independent representation

items.name: static func encode(Unicode.Scalar) -> Unicode.UTF32.EncodedScalar?
items.desc: Converts from encoding-independent to encoded representation, returning nil if the scalar can’t be represented in this encoding.

items.name: static func encode(Unicode.Scalar, into: (Unicode.UTF32.CodeUnit) -> Void)
items.desc: Encodes a Unicode scalar as a UTF-32 code unit by calling the given closure.

items.name: static func isASCII(Unicode.UTF32.CodeUnit) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the given code unit represents an ASCII scalar

items.name: static func transcode<FromEncoding>(FromEncoding.EncodedScalar, from: FromEncoding.Type) -> CollectionOfOne<UInt32>?
items.desc: Converts a scalar from another encoding’s representation, returning nil if the scalar can’t be represented in this encoding.

items.name: static func != (Unicode.UTF32, Unicode.UTF32) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.

items.name: static func == (Unicode.UTF32, Unicode.UTF32) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.
